text: Hard Happiness () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Stolper.ТРУДНОЕ СЧАСТЬЕТрудное счастье It stars Mikhail Kozakov, Valery Ashurov, and Viktor Avdyushko. == Actors == * Mikhail Kozakov as Nikolai Nagorny * Valery Ashurov as young Nagorny * Viktor Avdyushko as Seryoga Gvozdenko * Yevgeny Leonov as Agafon * Nina Golovina as Katya Yermolina * Veriko Anjaparidze as Nagorny's grandmother == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper
title: Hard Happiness
